description: Stretchy where you need flex and insulated where you need to trap heat, the Men's Novus LT Hybrid is the perfect midlayer on frigid days and an ideal standalone when you’re getting after it. Stretch grid fleece and PrimaLoft® silver insulation work together to provide comfortable warmth when the wet weather hits, and an attached elastic hood allows for extra coverage.
name: Marmot Novus LT Hybrid Hoody - Mens
